demolition

Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameObject
      • demolition.Wall

  • public abstract class Wall
extends GameObject
    Wall are background objects that blocks movements. There are two types of walls, one is breakable, the other is not.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class demolition.GameObject

        GameObject.Layer

    • Field Summary
